Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.
